mapper.select: select count(*) from bookmarks where user_id = #{userId}
select is_verified as isVerified ,profile_image_url as userProfileImageUrl from user where user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.applications_id AS applicationId, a.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, j.job_id AS jobId, j.title , j.job_type AS jobType, j.status AS status, c.name AS companyName, DATE_FORMAT(a.applied_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS appliedAt FROM applications a JOIN `user` u ON a.user_id = u.user_id JOIN job_posting j ON a.job_id = j.job_id JOIN company c ON j.company_id = c.company_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC

select u.profile_image_url as userProfileImageUrl ,m.id as id ,u.name as userName ,u.birth_date as birthDate ,u.phone_number as phoneNumber ,u.email as email ,u.is_verified as isVerified from user u join member m on u.member_id = m.member_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
